p: The ICS leaves were pulverized and sifted by an 80 mesh sieve. The powder was further triturated on a Retsch PM200 planetary ball mill (Retsch Inc., Haan, Germany) to obtain smaller particle size powder under optimal conditions. The optimized ball milling conditions were: The ball to powder weight ratio was 1:30, rotating speed was 300 rpm, and rotating time was 25 min.
